Events that occurred on 29 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1874 - Author G.K. Chesterton is born.
1930 - J.R.R. Tolkien's "The Oxford English School" is published in The Oxford Magazine.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 100.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 351.
1980 - Poems and Stories is published.
1980 - Actor Adam Brown is born.
1981 - The Atlas of Middle-earth by Karen Wynn Fonstad is published
2002 – The Lambengolmor mailing list goes online.
2009 - The first trailer of The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest is released.

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull (eds), The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion, p. xlix
